QuestData.Title: Sparks of Life: The Waking Shores
QuestData.Description:
Cannae ya smell the sweet scent of adventure on the wind?
The Waking Shores are close ta bursting with energy and life right now. Get out there and claim a piece for yourself!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Sparks of Life in the Waking Shores, while in War Mode.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
